text.section: Subject to subsection (b) of this section, an internal investigation unit may not bring administrative charges against a correctional officer unless the unit files the charges within 1 year after the act that gives rise to the charges comes to the attention of the managing official.
The 1-year limitation of subsection (a) of this section does not apply to charges that relate to criminal activity or excessive force.
